name: A Hollow Place [Working title]
description:
VERY EARLY ALPHA.

I've been working on this for just a few weeks, so expect bugs, and little to no gameplay.

Controls PC:
F - Interact
WASD - Move
Shift - Run

Controls Gamepad:
A - Interact
Left joystick - Move
X - Run
Start - Open Inventory

It's supposed to work with a PS4 controller, so if you have that it would be lovely to get feedback on if that works.

(On PC the F button also causes a weird screen effect, this was because I was testing the effect and set it to activate when F is pressed.)

If you want to support me, go to my patreon here https://www.patreon.com/ThubyDev
